html:
2025-0712
2025-10-10PS, JUSCriminal CodeOrder Amending Certain Orders Made Under the Criminal Code Order Amending Certain Orders Made Under the Criminal Code in order to 1) permit affected individuals to deliver the prohibited items to a mobile collection unit for destruction; 2) deliver their prohibited firearms to a licensed carrier to ship them for deactivation; 3) transport their prohibited items for the purpose of such deliveries only if they do so in accordance with the existing safety requirements set out in the Amnesty Orders; and 4) extend the amnesty period until October 30, 2026.Registration: SOR/2025-0208 Publication Date: 2025-10-22
subject: Order Amending Certain Orders Made Under the Criminal Code
precis: Order Amending Certain Orders Made Under the Criminal Code in order to 1) permit affected individuals to deliver the prohibited items to a mobile collection unit for destruction; 2) deliver their prohibited firearms to a licensed carrier to ship them for deactivation; 3) transport their prohibited items for the purpose of such deliveries only if they do so in accordance with the existing safety requirements set out in the Amnesty Orders; and 4) extend the amnesty period until October 30, 2026.
